name: Bobby Sue: The Game 5
description:
This is a game I found on an SD card in a bag stuck on my fence. I've looked all over the internet for ClickyGames or anything they have made, but there was nothing. The SD card looked old, so I assumed the game was abandoned long ago. Giving it a try, it seems there are some gameplay elements that require a later version, so I'm trying to find out how to update the game. It seems like it was made in HTML 5 in 2012, judging by the games content. It's also interesting to note that this is potentially a fifth game in a series, so maybe there are some older titles. in the meantime, here are the instructions:

Arrow keys to move during gameplay and mouse to navigate the menus.

Yeah that's it. This is definitely an early version of the game.
